Dark One/Hiss/Vehement:




"Yes, a ceasefire.  If our troops encounter each other, my troops will back 
off.  But we will not aid you in fights, and do not expect the same."

---

Hiss walked up to Dark One, covering both sides of his mouth and almost 
silently whispered into Dark One's mouth.

---

Dark One walked over to Zardus.  "Enemies behind us.  Not many, they're just 
sitting their." the Oblitercon leader whispered into Zardus' audio receptors.
